channel.title: Overspending on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Overspending on The Majority

item.title: Five more ways Nicola Sturgeon has failed Scotland
item.description: The very first article on this site, Nicola Sturgeon’s five biggest failures, got a huge response, with over 14,400 views so far.  But, so many of you said ‘Only five..?’ And we agree, so here’s some more of our First Minister's failures. Share widely... #5 Dude, where’s our superfast broadband? Lockdown measures over the last few months have really shown the importance of a reliable and fast broadband connection. In their 2016 election manifesto, the SNP proclaimed they would ensure “100% of premises across Scotland will have access to super-fast broadband by 2021.
